text: We'll Never Let Our Old Flag Fall is a World War I song written by Albert E. MacNutt and composed by M. F. Kelly. The song was first published in 1915 by Chappell & Co., in New York, NY. The sheet music cover was illustrated by Starmer and features words with an eagle on a shield.. The sheet music can be found at the Pritzker Military Museum & Library.Kelly, M. F., and Albert E. MacNutt. 1915. We'll never let our old flag fall. [United States]: J. Hanna. == References == Bibliography *Parker, Bernard S. World War I Sheet Music 1. Jefferson: McFarland & Company, Inc., 2007. . *Paas, John Roger. 2014. America sings of war: American sheet music from World War I. . Category:1915 songs Category:Songs of World War I
title: We'll Never Let Our Old Flag Fall
